DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , unicenter , randomize , open-label , single-dose , two-arms blind assessor phase I-II pilot study . Thirty-two ( 32 ) elderly patient ( 70-85 year age ) type 31A2 31A3 fracture femur ( AO/ASIF ( Association Study Internal Fixation ) classification ) admit emergency room Hospital Clinic Barcelona randomize 1:1 one two treatment-arms ( endomedullary nailing + XCEL-MT-OSTEO-BETA isolate endomedullary nailing standard treatment ) . Once surgically treat , patient follow 12 month primary objective safety . Secondary objective efficacy axial tomography xRay , clinical efficacy quality life questionnaire ( EUROQOL-5D ) .
